nodes.text: Quintad Orbital Manufacturing, also known as QOM, was a manufacturing firm that operated in the Seswenna sector during the latter years of the Galactic Republic. The Human Ranulph Tarkin served as an executive of QOM and during his tenure, he brokered a number of lease agreements with various Republic military manufacturers for the hire of space in QOM's shipyards and factories. In 57 BBY, Tarkin was appointed as the Governor-General of the Seswenna sector, and he turned control of QOM over to one of his cousins.
